resources.string: This App lets you send a siting of potentially illegal trawling activing to Ghana Government agency, Fisheries Enforcement Unit (FEU). \n \n Make a new report: take a picture of the vessel, writing in vessel desciption and location.

Contact the FEU to report illegal trawling: 
click the button below, 
OR 
use SMS #12345, 
website: http://www.ghana.gov.gh/feu, 
call toll free 12 34 56 78.
